1514770.name: Escape VR: The Nightmare Demo
1514770.description:
A tense but not terrible nightmare, you will experience a variety of different dreams. The nightmares will want you to attack and try to keep you in the dream. You need to master the balance between avoiding the attack and buying time to escape.

Monsters will attack you in various ways to keep you in the dream.

You can switch tracks to avoid monsters and their attacks.

You can use the weapons in the dream to fight back against the monsters and kill them to get more time to escape from the dream.
1514770.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
